title: FS:  T206 - PSA graded w/Sovereign and Polar Bear backs - ALL SOLD
author: willworkforT206

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 - PSA graded w/Sovereign and Polar Bear backs - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
I have the following PSA graded T206s for sale:

Jim Delehanty, PSA 4.5, Sweet Caporal 150/25, nice back - $55 SOLD
Cecil Ferguson, PSA 3, Polar Bear, very small corner crease - now $38  SOLD
John Frill, PSA 3, Sovereign 460, no creases, small stain on back - $55  SOLD
George Gibson, PSA 1, Sovereign 150, creases and stain on back - $20  SOLD
John Hummel, PSA 4, Sovereign 460, no creases - $70 SOLD
Tom Jones, PSA 4, Sovereign 150, light stain on back, though front/back combo - $60 SOLD
Jack Quinn, PSA 5, Sovereign 350, good color - $100  SOLD

Prices include shipping.  Add $2.00 for insurance (at buyer’s option).

E-mails committing to purchase take priority over posts.  Please e-mail me at [url]sschris@att.net[/url] if interested.  

Paypal is my preferred method of payment, but other arrangements can be made.

PLEASE BE PATIENT WITH E-MAIL RESPONSES/CORRESPONDENCE.  I HAVE LIMITED ACCESS TO E-MAIL DURING THE DAYTIME.  I WILL REPLY TO ALL E-MAILS.  THANKS.

Thanks for looking.

Steve
Hey Steve- I'll take the PSA 4 Hummel. Thanks, Bill

I'll take the Quinn (PSA 5).  Email sent as well.

Thanks,

Jason
